creator: CreaterSupporter
descriptionHtml:
This is strong plot creation app that support
・Novel ✏
・Manga 📖
・Movie 🎦
・Drama 🎭
・Secondary creation ♡
・TRPG Scenario 👥
・Script 💭

This app is fully packed with the essences of five script reference books, including "Screenplay: The Foundations of Screenwriting" and “save the cat”, called the scripture Bible.
This app will lead you to an interesting screenplay


** Features **

This app have
- Idea Note
- Plot Note
and
- Plot creation function
So, You can easily create plot using stored idea!!


The plot function has a quantity prediction function,
- What percentage of this chapter as a whole
- How much deviation is from the ideal line

In addition, functions such as
- character correlation diagrams
- story order changes
also available to support you.

If you stack writing plot, this app will support you to escape.
We support to write
- world setting 🌎
- char setting 👥
- theme setting 📚
By deepening these, you can continue to write plots


** Postscript **

Unless you have permission, this App does not send any creative data to the internet, so you can use it safe.

creator: CreaterSupporter
descriptionHtml:
This is strong plot creation app that support
・Novel ✏
・Manga 📖
・Movie 🎦
・Drama 🎭
・Secondary creation ♡
・TRPG Scenario 👥
・Script 💭

If you are worried about the following, we will suggest to use this App.
- I don't know what the plot looks like
- I can't organize the flow of the story and get confused
- I want to create attractive characters, want to organize relationships

This app is fully packed with the essences of more than 10 script reference books, including "Screenplay: The Foundations of Screenwriting" and “save the cat”, called the scripture Bible.
This app will lead you to an interesting screenplay

** Features **

This app have
- Idea Note
- Plot Note
and
- Plot creation function
So, You can easily create plot using stored idea!!


The plot function has a quantity prediction function,
- What percentage of this chapter as a whole
- How much deviation is from the ideal line

In addition, functions such as
- character correlation diagrams
- story order changes
also available to support you.

If you stack writing plot, this app will support you to escape.
We support to write
- world setting 🌎 ( Time series / Chronological table )
- character setting 👥 (Correlation chart)
- theme setting 📚
By deepening these, you can continue to write plots


** Postscript **

Unless you have permission, this App does not send any creative data to the internet, so you can use it safe.

This is strong plot creation app that support
・Novel ✏
・Manga 📖
・Movie 🎦
・Drama 🎭
・Secondary creation ♡
・TRPG Scenario 👥
・Script 💭

If you are worried about the following, we will suggest to use this App.
- I don't know what the plot looks like
- I can't organize the flow of the story and get confused
- I want to create attractive characters, want to organize relationships

This app is fully packed with the essences of more than 10 script reference books, including "Screenplay: The Foundations of Screenwriting" and “save the cat”, called the scripture Bible.
This app will lead you to an interesting screenplay

** Features **

This app have
- Idea Note
- Plot Note
and
- Plot creation function
So, You can easily create plot using stored idea!!


The plot function has a quantity prediction function,
- What percentage of this chapter as a whole
- How much deviation is from the ideal line

In addition, functions such as
- character correlation diagrams
- story order changes
also available to support you.

If you stack writing plot, this app will support you to escape.
We support to write
- world setting 🌎 ( Time series / Chronological table )
- character setting 👥 (Correlation chart)
- theme setting 📚
By deepening these, you can continue to write plots


** Postscript **

Unless you have permission, this App does not send any creative data to the internet, so you can use it safe.


** SubScribe **

For $4/month, we offer automatic data synchronization across multiple devices.
All features other than automatic data synchronization will continue to be available free of charge.
descriptionShort: Creative app - Allows you to create a great story from an idea

creator: CreaterSupporter
descriptionHtml:
This is strong plot creation app that support
- Novel ✏
- Manga 📖
- Movie 🎦
- Drama 🎭
- Secondary creation ♡
- TRPG Scenario 👥
- Script 💭

If you are worried about the following, we will suggest to use this App.
- I don't know what the plot looks like
- I can't organize the flow of the story and get confused
- I want to create attractive characters, want to organize relationships
- Lots of incidents, but unmanageable.

This app is fully packed with the essences of more than 15 script reference books, including "Screenplay: The Foundations of Screenwriting" and “save the cat”, called the scripture Bible.
This app will lead you to an interesting screenplay !!!

** Features **

This app have
- Idea Note
- Plot Note
and
- Plot creation function
So, You can easily create plot using stored idea!!

In addition, functions also available to support you.
- 🤖 Brainstorming with AI
- 👥 Correlation & Family Tree with Character setting
- 🌎 Time series with World Setting
- 📚 Theme Setting

By deepening these, you can escape from stack writing plot


** Postscript **

Unless you have permission, this App does not send any creative data to the internet, so you can use it safe.


** SubScribe **

For $4/month, we offer automatic data synchronization across multiple devices.
All features other than automatic data synchronization will continue to be available free of charge.
descriptionShort: Creative app - Allows you to create a great story from an idea

appDetails.developerAddress: 神奈川県横浜市篠原台町3-25-205
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Even if you can't do it in real life, you can have a family in the app..!

That's why we have added a family tree feature!
Create your own family tree by creating family members to your heart's content!

- Novel ✏
- Manga 📖
- Movie 🎦
- Drama 🎭
- Secondary creation ♡
- TRPG Scenario 👥
- Script 💭

If you are worried about the following, we will suggest to use this App.
- I don't know what the plot looks like
- I can't organize the flow of the story and get confused
- I want to create attractive characters, want to organize relationships
- Lots of incidents, but unmanageable.

This app is fully packed with the essences of more than 15 script reference books, including "Screenplay: The Foundations of Screenwriting" and “save the cat”, called the scripture Bible.
This app will lead you to an interesting screenplay !!!

** Features **

This app have
- Idea Note
- Plot Note
and
- Plot creation function
So, You can easily create plot using stored idea!!

In addition, functions also available to support you.
- 🤖 Brainstorming with AI
- 👥 Correlation & Family Tree with Character setting
- 🌎 Time series with World Setting
- 📚 Theme Setting

By deepening these, you can escape from stack writing plot


** Postscript **

Unless you have permission, this App does not send any creative data to the internet, so you can use it safe.


** SubScribe **

For $4/month, we offer automatic data synchronization across multiple devices.
All features other than automatic data synchronization will continue to be available free of charge.
descriptionShort: Creative app - Create a Great Story from an Idea
